title: The Importance of Irrigation: Basics Biology and Best Practices

tasks.task: Attend a webinar on irrigation essentials.
subtasks: Listen to the introduction by Matthew J. Grassi.
Learn about Shea Donald’s background and role as a field technician.
Understand Marisol Camacho’s background and responsibilities in irrigation layout and design.
Recognize the importance of avoiding drought stress in plants.
Understand factors affecting irrigation system planning (e.g., lighting, biomass, temperature, growth medium).
Consider the sustainability and adaptability of different growing media (coco coir, rockwool, peat).
Learn about the impact of changing growing conditions (e.g., light type, plant size).
Discuss the consequences of improper irrigation system design (e.g., capacity, redundancy).
Understand the differences in irrigation management between greenhouses and indoor facilities.
Recognize the use of advanced sensors and techniques (e.g., soil moisture sensors, crop steering) in managing irrigation.

tasks.task: Participate in a Q&A session following the webinar.
subtasks: Submit questions through the Q&A function during the presentation.
Listen to the presenters’ answers and guidance on avoiding drought stress.
